entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
